com.stormpath.sdk.factor

Interface CreateFactorRequestBuilder<T extends Factor,O extends FactorOptions>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - a subclass of Factor specifying the kind of Factor created by this CreateFactorRequest.
    O - a subclass of FactorOptions specifying the kind of FactorOptions to be used for creating a Factor.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CreateGoogleAuthenticatorFactorRequestBuilder, CreateSmsFactorRequestBuilder<T,O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCreateFactorRequestBuilder, DefaultCreateGoogleAuthenticatorFactorRequestBuilder, DefaultCreateSmsFactorRequestBuilder

    public interface CreateFactorRequestBuilder<T extends Factor,O extends FactorOptions>
    A Builder to construct CreateFactorRequests.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    See Also:
    Account.createFactor(CreateFactorRequest)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CreateFactorRequest<T,O> build()
      Creates a new CreateFactorRequest instance based on the current builder state.
      CreateFactorRequestBuilder createChallenge()
      Ensures that once a Factor is created, it is also challenged at the same time.
      CreateFactorRequestBuilder withResponseOptions(O options)
      Ensures that after a Factor is created, the creation response is retrieved with the specified factors's options.

    • Method Detail

      • withResponseOptions

        CreateFactorRequestBuilder withResponseOptions(O options)
                                        throws IllegalArgumentException
        Ensures that after a Factor is created, the creation response is retrieved with the specified factors's options. This enhances performance by leveraging a single request to retrieve multiple related resources you know you will use.
        Returns:
        the builder instance for method chaining.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if options is null.

      • createChallenge

        CreateFactorRequestBuilder createChallenge()
        Ensures that once a Factor is created, it is also challenged at the same time. This will also create a Challenge resource
        Returns:
        the builder instance for method chaining.

      • build

        CreateFactorRequest<T,O> build()
        Creates a new CreateFactorRequest instance based on the current builder state.
        Returns:
        a new CreateFactorRequest instance based on the current builder state.
